original_text: And as they were coming down the mountain, Jesus commanded them, “Tell no one the vision, until the Son of Man is raised from the dead.”
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 명하여 이르시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나기 전에는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And as they were coming down the mountain,
until the Son of Man is raised from the dead.”
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 죽은 자들 가운데서 살아날 때까지.”
